comment.author: Madison
comment.text: This coming from the guy who has Nazi supporters, spews hate, called for the assassination of Muslim children in our country, and in the state where "Christian" preachers are praising the Orlando shootings and literally praying for the deaths of the survivors in the hospital.

replies.author: Christian
replies.text: Boy what are you smoking? None of that is true.

replies.author: Madison
replies.text: That's just 1 preacher out of several. People might not agree that being gay or lesbian is right or wrong but we live in America. This is supposed to be the land of the free. People should be free to be with whomever they want.
